titles.title: A resolution commending the Tampa Bay Buccaneers football team for winning Super Bowl XXXVII.
A resolution commending the Tampa Bay Buccaneers football team for winning Super Bowl XXXVII.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the Senate on January 28, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends the Tampa Bay Buccaneers football team for winning Super Bowl XXXVII.
